item.title: Audrey add a quote by Gangaji
item.description: "Need nothing and then see what happens." -- Gangaji

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Gangaji
item.description: "Fufillment has nothing to do with circumstances." -- Gangaji

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "If you are not long, I will wait for you all my life." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The suspense is terrible. I hope it will last." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Yann Martel
item.description: "To choose doubt as a philosophy of life is akin to choosing immobility as a means of transportation." -- Yann Martel

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Johann wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Love is an ideal thing, marriage a real thing; a confusion of the real with the ideal never goes unpunished." -- Johann wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "God is a circle whose center is everywhere and circumference nowhere." -- Voltaire

item.title: Audrey add a quote by H.L. Mencken
item.description: "The older I grow, the more I distrust the familiar doctrine that age brings wisdom." -- H.L. Mencken

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Shelley Winters
item.description: "I think on-stage nudity is disgusting, shameful and damaging to all things American. But if I were 22 with a great body, it would be artistic, tasteful, patriotic, and a progressive religious experience." -- Shelley Winters

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Gwendolyn Brooks
item.description: "Each body has its art..." -- Gwendolyn Brooks

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Sam levenson
item.description: "Somewhere on this globe, every ten seconds, there is a woman giving birth to a child. She must be found and stopped." -- Sam levenson

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Norman Douglas
item.description: "If you want to see what children can do, you must stop giving them things." -- Norman Douglas

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Fashion is a form of ugliness so intolerable that we have to alter it every six months." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The books that the world calls immoral are books that show the world its own shame." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "I pack my trunk, embrace my friends, embark on the sea and at last wake up in Naples, and there beside me is the stern fact, the sad self, unrelenting, identical, that I fled from." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Audrey add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "To get the full value of joy you must have someone to divide it with." -- Mark Twain
